Description: Firstly, find the mug and the coffeemachine in the room. Take the mug and put it at the coffee outlet of the coffeemachine. Lastly, start the coffeemachine to make coffee.

Firstly, take the dirty plates and bowls to the sink. Turn on the faucet to rinse the dirty plates and bowls. Turn off the faucet. Find soapbottle and pump the soap onto dish sponge. Sponge the dirty plates and bowls. Turn on the faucet to rinse away the soap on the plates & bowls. Turn off the faucet. Put clean plates and bowls on countertop.
Firstly, find the apple, plate, and knife in the room. Take the apple, plate and knife to the countertop. Slice up the apple and plate it.
Firstly, find the bread and the toaster in the room. Take the bread and put into the toaster. Lastly, start the toaster.

Firstly, find the egg, pan, spatula and gas burner in the room. Crack the egg into the pan and put the pan on the gas burner. Turn on the stoveknobrange. Flip the egg with spatula to avoid burning the egg. Turn off stoveknobrange when egg is cooked.

Firstly, find the tomato, knife, pot, ladle and gas burner in the room. Take pot to sink. Turn on the faucet to fill pot. Turn off the faucet when pot is 3/4 filled. Put pot of water on gas burner. Turn on the stoveknobrange. Take the tomato to the sink. Turn on the faucet to rinse the tomato. Turn off the faucet. Take the tomato, knife to the countertop. Cut up the tomato and put it into pot of water when boiling. Find saltshaker, peppershaker. Add into tomato soup for flavour. Stir with ladle. Turn off the stoveknobrange when soup is ready to be served.

Firstly, find the lettuce, knife, pot, ladle and gas burner in the room. Take pot to sink. Turn on the faucet. Turn off the faucet when 3/4 pot filled. Put pot of water on gas burner. Turn on the stoveknobrange. Take the lettuce to the sink. Turn on the faucet to rinse the lettuce. Turn off the faucet. Take the lettuce, knife to the countertop. Cut up the lettuce and put it into pot of water when boiling. Find saltshaker, peppershaker. Add into lettuce soup for flavour. Stir with ladle. Turn off the stoveknobrange when soup is ready to be served.

Firstly, find the pot and gas burner in the room. Take pot to sink. Turn on the faucet. Turn off the faucet when 3/4 pot filled. Put pot of water on gas burner. Let it boil. Turn on the stoveknobrange. Turn off the stoveknobrange when water boils.
Find the cracked egg and find the bin. Throw the cracked egg into the bin.
Firstly, find the fridge in the room. Open the fridge. Take out items to be thrown away and put them on the countertop. Find bin. Throw items into bin.

Locate knife. Walk to knife. Pick up knife. Locate potato. Walk to potato. Pick up potato. Locate plate. Walk to plate. Place potato on plate. Use knife to cut through potato ten times. Place knife on counter top. Pick up plate. Walk to microwave. Open microwave door. Place plate in microwave. Close microwave door. Activate microwave. Listen for beep. Open microwave door. Pick up plate. Close microwave door. Place plate on counter top.

Locate cup. Walk to cup. Pick up cup. Locate wine bottle. Walk to wine bottle. Place cup on counter top. Open wine bottle. Pick up wine bottle. Tilt wine bottle to pour wine into cup. Observe cup until it is full. Straighten wine bottle. Place wine bottle on counter top. Close wine bottle.

Locate apple. Walk to apple. Pick up apple. Locate egg. Walk to egg. Pick up egg. Locate lettuce. Walk to lettuce. Pick up lettuce. Locate tomato. Walk to tomato. Pick up tomato. Walk to fridge. Open fridge door. Place apple, egg, lettuce, and tomato in fridge. Close fridge door.
Locate cup. Walk to cup. Pick up cup. Walk to sink. Place cup in sink basin. Turn on faucet. Observe cup until it is full. Turn off faucet.
Locate potato. Walk to potato. Pick up potato. Walk to sink. Hold potato under faucet. Activate faucet. Put them into boiling water.

Locate apple slices. Walk to apple slices. Observe if apple slices are used. Locate unused apple slices. Pick up unused apple slices. Walk to bin. Open bin. Place unused apple slices in bin. Close bin.

Locate fork. Walk to fork. Pick up fork. Locate knife. Walk to knife. Pick up knife. Locate spatula. Walk to spatula. Pick up spatula. Locate spoon. Walk to spoon. Pick up spoon. Walk to drawer. Open drawer. Place fork, knife, spatula, and spoon in drawer. Close drawer.

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_15_3
Description: Locate cup. Walk to cup. Pick up cup. Walk to sink. Hold cup over sink basin. Turn cup over. Observe cup until coffee is empty. Place cup in sink basin.
Locate pot. Walk to pot. Pick up pot. Walk to sink. Hold pot over sink basin. Turn pot over. Observe pot until water is drained. Place pot in sink basin.
Locate light. Walk to light. Observe how light is activated. Activate light.
Find laptop, pick it up, carry it to sofa, sit down, open laptop and press "on" button.
Locate TV, walk to it and press "on" switch, walk to sofa, sit down.

Task: Check the timing on the watch_219_3
Description: Locate watch, check for time
Find box, locate vase and newspaper, wrap vase in newspaper, put in box.
Find tissue box, it it's empty, toss in bin.

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_219_3
Description: Locate desk lamp, turn off
Locate cell phone, locate remote, hit cell phone screen with remote
Find cell phone, turn it on
Move over to the sofa. Take the remote off the sofa and place it on the desk.
Locate the book and read it
